程序包 ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

类 Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The odometer class keeps track of the robot's (x, y, theta) position.
    作者:
    Rodrigo Silva, Dirk Dubois, Derek Yu, Karim El-Baba, Michael Smith, Younes Boubekeur, Olivier St-Martin Cormier

    • 方法概要

      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static Odometer getOdometer()
      Returns the Odometer Object.
      double[] getXyt()
      Returns the Odometer data.
      void printPosition()
      Prints odometer information to the console with x and y in meters.
      void printPositionInTileLengths()
      Prints odometer information to the console with x and y in tile lengths (feet).
      void run()  
      void setTheta​(double theta)
      Overwrites theta.
      void setX​(double x)
      Overwrites x.
      void setXyt​(double x, double y, double theta)
      Overrides the values of x, y and theta.
      void setY​(double y)
      Overwrites y.
      static void updateDeltaPosition​(int[] prev, int[] curr, double theta, double[] deltas)
      Updates the robot deltaPosition (x, y, theta) given the motor tacho counts.
      void updateOdometerValues()
      Increments the current values of the x, y and theta instance variables given deltaPositions.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • getOdometer

        public static Odometer getOdometer()
        Returns the Odometer Object. Use this method to obtain an instance of Odometer.

      • run

        public void run()
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

      • updateDeltaPosition

        public static void updateDeltaPosition​(int[] prev,
                                       int[] curr,
                                       double theta,
                                       double[] deltas)
        Updates the robot deltaPosition (x, y, theta) given the motor tacho counts.
        参数:
        prev - the previous tacho counts of the motors
        curr - the current tacho counts of the motors
        theta - the current heading (angle) of the robot
        deltas - the deltaPosition array (x, y, theta)

      • printPosition

        public void printPosition()
        Prints odometer information to the console with x and y in meters.

      • printPositionInTileLengths

        public void printPositionInTileLengths()
        Prints odometer information to the console with x and y in tile lengths (feet).

      • getXyt

        public double[] getXyt()
        Returns the Odometer data.

        odoData[0] = x; odoData[1] = y; odoData[2] = theta;

        返回:
        the odometer data.

      • updateOdometerValues

        public void updateOdometerValues()
        Increments the current values of the x, y and theta instance variables given deltaPositions. Useful for odometry.

      • setXyt

        public void setXyt​(double x,
                   double y,
                   double theta)
        Overrides the values of x, y and theta. Use for odometry correction.
        参数:
        x - the value of x
        y - the value of y
        theta - the value of theta in degrees

      • setX

        public void setX​(double x)
        Overwrites x. Use for odometry correction.
        参数:
        x - the value of x

      • setY

        public void setY​(double y)
        Overwrites y. Use for odometry correction.
        参数:
        y - the value of y

      • setTheta

        public void setTheta​(double theta)
        Overwrites theta. Use for odometry correction.
        参数:
        theta - the value of theta
